statements: SELECT * FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE critical_flag = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM PatientInformation WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM PatientInformation ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Male' AND critical_flag = TRUE ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, admission_date FROM PatientInformation WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, admission_date FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC, admission_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT diagnosis FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id=3
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND diagnosis IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC, date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_title, guideline_category FROM Guidelines;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, MedicalRecords.record_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.record_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY MedicalRecords.record_date DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, MedicalRecords.prescription, Guidelines.guideline_title FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id LEFT JOIN Guidelines ON MedicalRecords.record_id = Guidelines.guideline_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis = 'Flu' AND Guidelines.guideline_category = 'Infectious Diseases';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, COUNT(MedicalRecords.record_id) AS num_records FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = Medicaljson_records.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name HAVING num_records > 3;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, MedicalRecords.prescription, Guidelines.guideline_title FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id LEFT JOIN Guidelines ON MedicalRecords.record_id = Guidelines.guideline_id WHERE Patients.patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_title FROM MedicalGuidelines WHERE guideline_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT guideline_title, SUBSTRING(guideline_description, 1, 50) AS short_description FROM MedicalGuidelines WHERE LENGTH(guideline_description) > 100;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;

SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, age, admission_date FROM patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.treatment FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT doctors.doctor_name, doctors.specialization, hospitals.hospital_name FROM doctors INNER JOIN hospitals ON doctors.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id;

SELECT appointments.appointment_date, patients.patient_name, doctors.doctor_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
